mapper.select: SELECT MATCH S.MEM_NO AS memNo, S.RESERV_START AS reservStart, S.RESERV_END AS reservEnd FROM TEAM T JOIN MEM NO ON T.MEM_NO = S.TEAM_NO
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO STADIUM_REVIEW ( REVIEW_CONTENT, REVIEW_STAR, STADIUM_NO, MEM_NO, REVIEW_DATE ) VALUES ( #{reviewContent}, #{reviewStar}, #{stadiumNo}, #{memNo}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT S.STADIUM_NO as stadiumNo, S.MEM_NO as memNo, S.STADIUM_NAME as stadiumName, S.STADIUM_ZIPCODE as stadiumZipcode, S.STADIUM_ADDRESS as stadiumAddress, S.STADIUM_SCORE as stadiumScore, S.STADIUM_PRICE as stadiumPrice, S.STADIUM_CATEGORY as stadiumCategory, S.STADIUM_START_TIME as stadiumStartTime, S.STADIUM_END_TIME as stadiumEndTime, S.STATUS as status, -- 물품 지원 R.BALL, R.VEST, -- 편의 시설 A.TOILET, A.SHOWER, A.SMOKE, A.PARK, A.DRINK FROM STADIUM S LEFT JOIN STADIUM_RENTAL R ON S.STADIUM_NO = R.STADIUM_NO LEFT JOIN STADIUM_AM A ON S.STADIUM_NO = A.STADIUM_NO WHERE S.STADIUM_NO = #{stadiumNo}

SELECT SR.REVIEW_NO AS reviewNo, SR.STADIUM_NO AS stadiumNo, SR.MEM_NO AS memNo, M.MEM_NAME AS memName, SR.REVIEW_STAR AS reviewStar, SR.REVIEW_CONTENT AS reviewContent, SR.REVIEW_DATE AS reviewDate FROM STADIUM_REVIEW SR JOIN MEMBER M ON SR.MEM_NO = M.MEM_NO WHERE SR.STADIUM_NO = #{stadiumNo} ORDER BY SR.REVIEW_DATE DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}

SELECT TM.TEAM_NO AS teamNo, -- 구단 번호 T.MEM_NO AS tmemNo, -- 구단장 번호 (별칭으로 tmemNo 사용) T.TEAM_NAME AS teamName, -- 구단 이름 T.SCORE AS Score, -- 구단 평점 T.TEAM_POINT AS teamPoint, -- 구단 점수 TM.MEM_NO AS memNo, -- 멤버 번호 M.MEM_NAME AS memName, -- 멤버 이름 TM.STATUS AS Status, -- 멤버 상태 -- 대기 중인 매치 정보 `MATCH`.MATCH_NO AS matchNo, `MATCH`.TEAM_A_NO AS teamANo, `MATCH`.TEAM_B_NO AS teamBNo, `MATCH`.CATEGORY AS category, `MATCH`.RESERV_START AS reservStart, `MATCH`.RESERV_END AS reservEnd, `MATCH`.ACCESS_DATE AS accessDate FROM TEAM_MEMBER TM JOIN TEAM T ON TM.TEAM_NO = T.TEAM_NO JOIN MEMBER M ON TM.MEM_NO = M.MEM_NO LEFT JOIN `MATCH` ON T.TEAM_NO = `MATCH`.TEAM_A_NO WHERE T.TEAM_NO = #{teamNo} -- 팀 번호로 조회 AND TM.STATUS = 'Y' AND (`MATCH`.TEAM_B_NO IS NULL OR `MATCH`.TEAM_B_NO = 0); -- B팀이 매칭되지 않은 경우
SELECT TEAM_NO FROM TEAM WHERE MEM_NO = #{memNo} AND STATUS = 'Y'; -- 활성화된 상태
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM STADIUM_QNA sq JOIN STADIUM s ON sq.STADIUM_NO = s.STADIUM_NO WHERE s.MEM_NO = #{memNo}

SELECT sq.MATCH_QNA_NO as matchQnaNo, sq.MATCH_Q_TITLE as matchQTitle, sq.MATCH_Q_DETAIL as matchQDetail, sq.MATCH_A as matchA, sq.MATCH_QNA_DATE as matchQnaDate FROM STADIUM_QNA sq JOIN STADIUM s ON sq.STADIUM_NO = s.STADIUM_NO WHERE s.MEM_NO = #{memNo} ORDER BY MATCH_QNA_NO DESC;
